definition.text: The Dominican Republic is a sovereign presidential republic on the island of Hispaniola in the Caribbean, sharing its territory with Haiti. Historically shaped by sugarcane, mining, and tourism, it has evolved into a dynamic economy with strong remittance inflows, diversified services and industrial sectors, and growing investments in renewable energy and infrastructure.
